GSD.description:
drivers: usb: host: Fix deadlock in oxu_bus_suspend()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit a3d380188bde8900c3f604e82b56572896499124. For more details please see the references link.
